mapper.sql: FMED.f_id as FMEDid,FMED.t_family_msg_f_id as FMEDtFamilyMsgFId,FMED.f_data_id as FMEDdataId,FMED.f_data_type as FMEDdataType,FMED.f_ep_name as FMEDepName,FMED.f_ep_name_mini as FMEDepNameMini,FMED.f_ep_price as FMEDepPrice,FMED.f_ep_price_discount as FMEDepPriceDiscount,FMED.f_ep_pic_base as FMEDepPicBase,FMED.f_ep_pic_base_mini as FMEDepPicBaseMini,FMED.f_ep_price_unit as FMEDepPriceUnit,FMED.f_ep_desc as FMEDepDesc,FMED.f_ep_price_point as FMEDepPricePoint,FMED.f_ep_price_discount_point as FMEDepPriceDiscountPoint,FMED.f_ep_point_type as FMEDepPointType,FMED.f_ep_special_product_type as FMEDepSpecialProductType,FMED.f_ep_buycar_id as FMEDepBuycarId,FMED.f_ep_buycar_product_id as FMEDepBuycarProductId,FMED.f_ep_buycar_qty as FMEDepBuycarQty,date_format(FMED.f_ep_buycar_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMEDepBuycarCreateTime,FMED.f_kcb_collect_user as FMEDkcbCollectUser,date_format(FMED.f_kcb_collect_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMEDkcbCollectTime,FMED.f_kcb_name as FMEDkcbName,FMED.f_kcb_pic_url as FMEDkcbPicUrl,FMED.f_kcb_desc as FMEDkcbDesc,FMED.f_kcb_eat_weight as FMEDkcbEatWeight,FMED.f_kcb_cook_time as FMEDkcbCookTime,FMED.f_kcb_cook_step as FMEDkcbCookStep,FMED.f_kcb_taste as FMEDkcbTaste,FMED.f_kcb_cook_tech as FMEDkcbCookTech,FMED.f_kcb_tips as FMEDkcbTips,date_format(FMED.f_pr_prize_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMEDprPrizeTime,FMED.f_pr_discount as FMEDprDiscount,FMED.f_pr_user_room_id as FMEDprUserRoomId,date_format(FMED.f_pr_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMEDprEndTime

FMED1.f_id as FMED1id,FMED1.t_family_msg_f_id as FMED1tFamilyMsgFId,FMED1.f_data_id as FMED1dataId,FMED1.f_data_type as FMED1dataType,FMED1.f_ep_name as FMED1epName,FMED1.f_ep_name_mini as FMED1epNameMini,FMED1.f_ep_price as FMED1epPrice,FMED1.f_ep_price_discount as FMED1epPriceDiscount,FMED1.f_ep_pic_base as FMED1epPicBase,FMED1.f_ep_pic_base_mini as FMED1epPicBaseMini,FMED1.f_ep_price_unit as FMED1epPriceUnit,FMED1.f_ep_desc as FMED1epDesc,FMED1.f_ep_price_point as FMED1epPricePoint,FMED1.f_ep_price_discount_point as FMED1epPriceDiscountPoint,FMED1.f_ep_point_type as FMED1epPointType,FMED1.f_ep_special_product_type as FMED1epSpecialProductType,FMED1.f_ep_buycar_id as FMED1epBuycarId,FMED1.f_ep_buycar_product_id as FMED1epBuycarProductId,FMED1.f_ep_buycar_qty as FMED1epBuycarQty,date_format(FMED1.f_ep_buycar_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMED1epBuycarCreateTime,FMED1.f_kcb_collect_user as FMED1kcbCollectUser,date_format(FMED1.f_kcb_collect_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMED1kcbCollectTime,FMED1.f_kcb_name as FMED1kcbName,FMED1.f_kcb_pic_url as FMED1kcbPicUrl,FMED1.f_kcb_desc as FMED1kcbDesc,FMED1.f_kcb_eat_weight as FMED1kcbEatWeight,FMED1.f_kcb_cook_time as FMED1kcbCookTime,FMED1.f_kcb_cook_step as FMED1kcbCookStep,FMED1.f_kcb_taste as FMED1kcbTaste,FMED1.f_kcb_cook_tech as FMED1kcbCookTech,FMED1.f_kcb_tips as FMED1kcbTips,date_format(FMED1.f_pr_prize_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMED1prPrizeTime,FMED1.f_pr_discount as FMED1prDiscount,FMED1.f_pr_user_room_id as FMED1prUserRoomId,date_format(FMED1.f_pr_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as FMED1prEndTime

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_family_msg_ext_data ,t_family_msg_f_id=#{tFamilyMsgFId} ,f_data_id=#{dataId} ,f_data_type=#{dataType} ,f_ep_name=#{epName} ,f_ep_name_mini=#{epNameMini} ,f_ep_price=#{epPrice} ,f_ep_price_discount=#{epPriceDiscount} ,f_ep_pic_base=#{epPicBase} ,f_ep_pic_base_mini=#{epPicBaseMini} ,f_ep_price_unit=#{epPriceUnit} ,f_ep_desc=#{epDesc} ,f_ep_price_point=#{epPricePoint} ,f_ep_price_discount_point=#{epPriceDiscountPoint} ,f_ep_point_type=#{epPointType} ,f_ep_special_product_type=#{epSpecialProductType} ,f_ep_buycar_id=#{epBuycarId} ,f_ep_buycar_product_id=#{epBuycarProductId} ,f_ep_buycar_qty=#{epBuycarQty} ,f_ep_buycar_create_time=str_to_date(#{epBuycarCreateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_kcb_collect_user=#{kcbCollectUser} ,f_kcb_collect_time=str_to_date(#{kcbCollectTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_kcb_name=#{kcbName} ,f_kcb_pic_url=#{kcbPicUrl} ,f_kcb_desc=#{kcbDesc} ,f_kcb_eat_weight=#{kcbEatWeight} ,f_kcb_cook_time=#{kcbCookTime} ,f_kcb_cook_step=#{kcbCookStep} ,f_kcb_taste=#{kcbTaste} ,f_kcb_cook_tech=#{kcbCookTech} ,f_kcb_tips=#{kcbTips} ,f_pr_prize_time=str_to_date(#{prPrizeTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pr_discount=#{prDiscount} ,f_pr_user_room_id=#{prUserRoomId} ,f_pr_end_time=str_to_date(#{prEndTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_family_msg_ext_data ,t_family_msg_f_id=#{item.tFamilyMsgFId} ,f_data_id=#{item.dataId} ,f_data_type=#{item.dataType} ,f_ep_name=#{item.epName} ,f_ep_name_mini=#{item.epNameMini} ,f_ep_price=#{item.epPrice} ,f_ep_price_discount=#{item.epPriceDiscount} ,f_ep_pic_base=#{item.epPicBase} ,f_ep_pic_base_mini=#{item.epPicBaseMini} ,f_ep_price_unit=#{item.epPriceUnit} ,f_ep_desc=#{item.epDesc} ,f_ep_price_point=#{item.epPricePoint} ,f_ep_price_discount_point=#{item.epPriceDiscountPoint} ,f_ep_point_type=#{item.epPointType} ,f_ep_special_product_type=#{item.epSpecialProductType} ,f_ep_buycar_id=#{item.epBuycarId} ,f_ep_buycar_product_id=#{item.epBuycarProductId} ,f_ep_buycar_qty=#{item.epBuycarQty} ,f_ep_buycar_create_time=str_to_date(#{item.epBuycarCreateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_kcb_collect_user=#{item.kcbCollectUser} ,f_kcb_collect_time=str_to_date(#{item.kcbCollectTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_kcb_name=#{item.kcbName} ,f_kcb_pic_url=#{item.kcbPicUrl} ,f_kcb_desc=#{item.kcbDesc} ,f_kcb_eat_weight=#{item.kcbEatWeight} ,f_kcb_cook_time=#{item.kcbCookTime} ,f_kcb_cook_step=#{item.kcbCookStep} ,f_kcb_taste=#{item.kcbTaste} ,f_kcb_cook_tech=#{item.kcbCookTech} ,f_kcb_tips=#{item.kcbTips} ,f_pr_prize_time=str_to_date(#{item.prPrizeTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pr_discount=#{item.prDiscount} ,f_pr_user_room_id=#{item.prUserRoomId} ,f_pr_end_time=str_to_date(#{item.prEndTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_family_msg_ext_data WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
